(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (CD One))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (PRP$ my) (JJS fondest) (NN food) (NNS memories))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB how))
        (S
          (NP (PRP$ my) (NN Dad))
          (VP (VBD used)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB rave)
                  (PP (IN about)
                    (NP (NNP Soup) (NNP Kambing))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(is-7, One-1)
prep(One-1, of-2)
poss(memories-6, my-3)
amod(memories-6, fondest-4)
nn(memories-6, food-5)
pobj(of-2, memories-6)
root(ROOT-0, is-7)
advmod(used-11, how-8)
poss(Dad-10, my-9)
nsubj(used-11, Dad-10)
ccomp(is-7, used-11)
aux(rave-13, to-12)
xcomp(used-11, rave-13)
prep(rave-13, about-14)
nn(Kambing-16, Soup-15)
pobj(about-14, Kambing-16)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD ca) (RB n't)
      (VP (VB remember)
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB where))
          (S
            (NP (PRP we))
            (VP (VBD ate)
              (NP (DT the) (NNP Soup) (NNP Kambing)))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(remember-4, I-1)
aux(remember-4, ca-2)
neg(remember-4, n't-3)
root(ROOT-0, remember-4)
advmod(ate-7, where-5)
nsubj(ate-7, we-6)
advcl(remember-4, ate-7)
det(Kambing-10, the-8)
nn(Kambing-10, Soup-9)
dobj(ate-7, Kambing-10)


(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD would)
      (ADVP (RB always))
      (VP (VB remember)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP it))
            (VP (VBD was)
              (NP
                (NP (CD one))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (PRP$ his) (JJ favorite) (NNS dishes)))))))))
    (. .)))


cc(remember-5, but-1)
nsubj(remember-5, I-2)
aux(remember-5, would-3)
advmod(remember-5, always-4)
root(ROOT-0, remember-5)
mark(one-9, that-6)
nsubj(one-9, it-7)
cop(one-9, was-8)
ccomp(remember-5, one-9)
prep(one-9, of-10)
poss(dishes-13, his-11)
amod(dishes-13, favorite-12)
pobj(of-10, dishes-13)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (CC But)
    (RB even)
    (SBAR (IN though)
      (S
        (NP (PRP I))
        (VP (MD can) (RB not)
          (VP (VB remember)
            (NP (DT the) (NN place))))
        (, ,)))))


cc(even-2, But-1)
root(ROOT-0, even-2)
mark(remember-7, though-3)
nsubj(remember-7, I-4)
aux(remember-7, can-5)
neg(remember-7, not-6)
dep(even-2, remember-7)
det(place-9, the-8)
dobj(remember-7, place-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD will)
      (ADVP (RB always))
      (VP (VB remember)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN taste))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (NN soup))))
        (S
          (VP (VBG kambing)
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP (PRP we))
                (VP (VBD had)
                  (NP (NNS years))
                  (ADVP (IN ago)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(remember-4, I-1)
aux(remember-4, will-2)
advmod(remember-4, always-3)
root(ROOT-0, remember-4)
det(taste-6, the-5)
dobj(remember-4, taste-6)
prep(taste-6, of-7)
det(soup-9, the-8)
pobj(of-7, soup-9)
xcomp(remember-4, kambing-10)
nsubj(had-12, we-11)
ccomp(kambing-10, had-12)
tmod(had-12, years-13)
advmod(had-12, ago-14)
